text: Two main groups of tyrosine hydroxylase(TH) -immunoreactive ( tyrosine hydroxylase(TH) i) perikarya appear very early in development: one group in the midbrain which gives rise to the future ventral tegmental area, substantia nigra and retrorubral cell groups, and another group in the tuberomammillary hypothalamus.

text: The organization of the thalamocortical connections of the mediodorsal thalamic nucleus in the rat, related to the ventral forebrain-prefrontal cortex topography.
Because MD is reciprocally interconnected with prefrontal and agranular insular cortical areas, it provides a relay of ventral forebrain activity to these cortical areas.

The piriform cortex(PC) projections to the central and medial segments of MD and to the lateral orbital cortex (LO) and the ventral and posterior agranular insular cortices (AIv and AIp) are topographically organized, such that more caudal parts of piriform cortex(PC) tend to project more medially in MD and more caudally within the orbital/insular cortex.

text: Cytoarchitectonic and neurochemical studies of the dorsal vagal complex in the caudal medulla oblongata of rats indicate the existence of distinct anatomical and functional compartments within its components.

Analysis of 11 subdivisions of area postrema identified both "true" (range in luminal diameter of 3-7.5 microns) and sinusoidal (luminal diameter greater than 7.5 microns) capillaries that, together, made the capillary density for most of area postrema 75% greater than that found in nucleus tractus solitarii(NTS) and DMN (526/mm2 vs about 300/mm2).

Within 200 microns of obex, the ventral zone of rostral area postrema was distinct, having a relatively sparse capillary density that may indicate morphological specializations limiting blood-tissue communication in this subregion.

text: With the use of nucleus ambiguus(NA) DPH diaphorase histochemistry and nitric oxide synthase(NOS) immunohistochemistry, a compact group of nitric oxide synthase(NOS) -positive perikarya was identified in the central subnucleus of the nucleus tractus solitarius(NTS) dorsomedial to the tractus solitarius and rostral to the obex.

Afferent fibres from the esophagus were found around the nitric oxide synthase(NOS) cell bodies in the central nucleus tractus solitarius(NTS) , and many of these nitric oxide synthase(NOS) neurons were double labeled with cholera toxin-gold after injection of this tracer into the nucleus ambiguus(NA) .

The lateral and medial superior olives project bilaterally; the bilateral projection from the medial superior olive is unusual in that it is found in only a few mammalian species.
